item.title: SWEA-Dataveg: A vegetation-plot database for Africa
item.dc:creator: Miguel Alvarez
item.description: A collection of vegetation-plots from Africa, originally focused on wetland vegetation from Eastern Africa, it is currently expanded to other areas and considering any kind of vegetation.

item.title: A journey in rOpenSci
item.dc:creator: Miguel Alvarez
item.description: A brief account of the experiences gained after a bit more than 2 years review process of the package taxlist for its submission to rOpenSci. This journey resulted on new tools learned and new friends. The talk was presented at LatinR 2020 (virtual meeting).

item.title: R for AfRica
item.dc:creator: Miguel Alvarez
Bisrat H. Gebrekhidan
Samuel Kiboi
item.description: The proliferation of freeware and open source applications expands the potential of scientists, especially in countries of difficult access to commercial licenses for software tools. In the context of enhanced international networks between education and research institutions, training on use of freeware is becoming a crucial step for a better balance in collaboration between European and Eastern African countries, harmonizing the capacities among researchers and students.

item.title: Tanzanian wetlands in the cover of Phytocoenologia
item.dc:creator: Miguel Alvarez
item.description: A publication on classification of East African wetland communities in the context of the Braun-Blanquet approach managed to the cover of the journal Phytocoenologia.
